DataElement.preferredName: Material Component Identification Nanoparticle Component Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The material name for each of the components of the nanoparticle sample.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A small, stable particle whose size is measured in nanometers. These particles are used in various biomedical applications in which they can be utilized as drug carriers or imaging agents. Various targeting agents, such as antibodies, drugs, imaging agents, and reporters can be attached to the surface of a nanoparticle._An artifact that is one of the individual parts of which a composite entity is made up; especially a part that can be separated from or attached to a system._The words or language units by which a thing is known.
